<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.service_management.core" name="Service Management Core" version="1.0.0" help="Service_Management" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" namespace="sn_sm" licensable="true" license_model="mixed">
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.automatic_assignment"/> <import plugin="com.snc.asset_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.process_flow_formatter"/> <import plugin="com.snc.state_flows"/> <import plugin="com.snc.knowledge3"/> <import plugin="com.snc.skills_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.territory_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.document_management"/> <import plugin="com.snc.task_activity" /> <import plugin="com.snc.service_management.geolocation" /> <import plugin="com.snc.service_management_m" /> <import plugin="com.glide.encryption" /> <import plugin="com.snc.common_workbench"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.checklist"/> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMMessageUtil" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMMessageUtil"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMScheduleStatus" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMScheduleStatus"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMACLCreatorUtil" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMACLCreatorUtil" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMConfiguration" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMConfiguration"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ScopedSMConfiguration" class="com.snc.service_management.core.fencing.ScopedSMConfiguration"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMAppFormCloner" class="com.snc.service_management.core.SMAppFormCloner" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMConfigCompatibility" class="com.snc.service_management.core.ui.SMConfigCompatibility" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="SMTemplateCompatibility" class="com.snc.service_management.core.ui.SMTemplateCompatibility" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_sm_config_processor" class="com.snc.service_management.core.ui.SMConfigProcessor" /> <extension point="com.glide.ui.ng" name="ng_sm_template_processor" class="com.snc.service_management.core.ui.SMTemplateProcessor" /> <description>Installs the core Service Management items used to allow other service-related plug-ins to work, such as Field Service, Facilities, HR, Legal, Finance, Marketing and the custom-app creator.</description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Installs the core Service Management items used to allow other service-related plug-ins to work, such as Field Service, Facilities, HR, Legal, Finance, Marketing and the custom-app creator.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Service_Management</help> <id>com.snc.service_management.core</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Service Management Core</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.service_management.core/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.automatic_assignment,com.snc.asset_management,com.snc.process_flow_formatter,com.snc.state_flows,com.snc.knowledge3,com.snc.skills_management,com.snc.territory_management,com.snc.document_management,com.snc.task_activity,com.snc.service_management.geolocation,com.snc.service_management_m,com.glide.encryption,com.snc.common_workbench,com.glide.ui.checklist</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on>
